Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options

Class PageRanges

java.lang.Object
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.PageRanges
public class PageRanges extends Object
Page ranges of a file, inclusive of start and end page index, where page index starts from 1.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PageRanges()
    Constructs a new PageRanges instance with no pages added.
